name: Spacetime Cookout Massacre: The Meal You Won't Forget
name_original: Spacetime Cookout Massacre: The Meal You Won't Forget
description:
Move with W A S D

Look around with mouse

Left click to pick up items and put them down again

Right click to shoot weapons
